name: Motor Money Crash!
description:
Hop in the driver's seat of this vehicular, first person shooter and fight your way through the chaos of the nation's #1 game show, Motor Money Crash! Tear through overwhelming odds with your front mounted machine gun, 180 degree free-aim your trusty submachine gun, and crash through anything that gets in the way of bringing home the grand prize.

This is a protoype version of the game, released for the 2014 #7DFPS game jam. Check in again for future updates, or follow the progress at:

@lowpoly

26k tumblr
